comments:
Our graphical editor uses GEF and allows users to edit text Figures on
the canvas. If the user deletes all the text on the figure the following
exception is thrown (see Caused by exception):



org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable
(java.lang.IllegalArgumentException)

This problems has already been reported.  Keep in mind that JDK 1.5 is not a 
supported platform. You should first verify that the bug occurs using a 1.4.2 
version JRE.

Try a more recent GEF build.
